nodes.text: Unhappy about Katie? I'm sorry...
I don't want to talk about it right now.
Still crazy for Katie, I see.
She's the only girl for me! Here's the song I wrote last night about her -

Of all the fine ladies upon this great land,
For me Katie, I'll sail on the sea,
There's one who's the finest and ever so grand!
There's none to compare with bonny Katie.

'Twas at Hero-u when I first caught the sight,
For me Katie, I'll sail on the sea,
Of the woman who fills me with joy and delight.
There's none to compare with bonny Katie.

She sat in the Rec Room. Twas her turn to deal.
For me Katie, I'll sail on the sea.
My money she won and my heart she did steal.
There's none to compare with bonny Katie.
What do you think - Will Katie be blown away by it?
There'll never be a better chantey for Katie.
If you cast lines out like that, you'll reel her in for sure.
That song goes from bad to verse. When it comes to singing love sea chanteys, it's no wonder you're a buoy without a gull.
I spoke to Katie today...
Did you tell her how I loved the way she sailed into my heart?

options.text: Tell Aeolus the Truth About Katie

nodes.text: I told her how much you cared about her and what a fun guy you are...
How did she react? Does she like me? Will she go out with me?
I'm sorry, but she didn't seem very interested in dating you.
Oh.

options.text: Lie to Aeolus that Katie Really Likes Him

nodes.text: I told her that you were the cleverest and nicest guy I know.
What did she say? Does she like me?
She said that you were the funniest person she knows and that you make her smile.
Yes! Thanks for your help. I'll talk to Katie as soon as I can to ask her out on a date. I hope she doesn't mind that I don't know how to swim.

options.text: Tell Aeolus You Didn't Talk to Katie

nodes.text: Sorry, but I didn't get a chance to talk to Katie about you today.
I really would appreciate it if you do talk to her. I'll try to get the nerve to speak with her tomorrow.
Katie thinks you are special and that you are fun to be around.
Really? This is great! I'll ask her out on a date tomorrow. Maybe she'd like to go to the Mermaid's Kiss tavern and sing sea chanteys there.
Thanks, Shawn! This is the happiest moment of my life.

options.text: Lie that Katie Doesn't Like Aeolus

nodes.text: Sorry to be the one to tell you, Aeolus, but Katie really isn't interested in you or your music.
Oh.

options.text: Tell Aeolus that Katie Loves Shawn

nodes.text: The truth is - Katie is in love with me.
She loves you? If you were going with her all this time why didn't you tell me?

options.text: Explain that You Didn't Know of Katie's Love

nodes.text: I had no idea that Katie cared that much for me, but when I went to speak with her about you - she admitted that it was me she cared about. She's had a crush on me from first sight.
I hope you and she will be happy together.
Katie loves you and not me. My life is over.

options.text: Explain that You Didn't Want to Break Aeolus' Heart

nodes.text: Aeolus - you and I are best friends. I had no idea that Katie felt that strongly about me. I really had hoped that things would work out for you two.

options.text: Tell Aeolus that You Love Katie

nodes.text: Aeolus, I've been meaning to tell you - I'm in love with Katie.
Why didn't you tell me you loved Katie before this?

options.text: Say You Didn't Know You Loved Katie

nodes.text: Until you spoke about Katie, I didn't admit to myself how much I cared for her. I kept pretending she was just a friend. Now I know I am deeply in love with her.
Well, I love Katie deeply. I'll talk to her tomorrow and tell her just how I feel. We'll see whether she cares for you more than for me.

options.text: Say You Didn't Want to Hurt Aeolus

nodes.text: I know how deeply you feel about Katie. I didn't want to make the situation worse by admitting my love for Katie, but I can't deny it. Katie is the most wonderful person in the world.
Some friend you are.
Why didn't you tell me this before?

options.text: Tell Aeolus that You Didn't Want to Hurt Him

nodes.text: Aeolus - you are my best friend. I didn't want Katie to come between us, but I can't help loving Katie. You are right - she's amazing.
I just wish you had said you liked Katie before I fell in love with her.

options.text: Tell Aeolus that You Didn't Know What Love Was

nodes.text: Until this moment, I thought I only liked Katie as a friend. It didn't occur to me that what I feel toward her is so much more. It hurts to think of you sailing away with her. I want Katie to love me.
I wish that you had talked this over with me before I fell in love with Katie.
Sweet dreams, Aeolus.
I'll be sailing away, on Moon lit Bay with Katie afloat, on my dreamboat!
Try to get some rest, Aeolus.
<shrug>
